Sentencas: A deep learning based homogenization framework is proposed to link the microstructures of porous nickel/yttriastabilized zirconia anodes in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) to their effective macroscopic properties.
Titulo: Correlation between microstructures and macroscopic properties of nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) anodes: Meso-scale modeling and deep learning with convolutional neural networks

Sentencas: A variety of microstructures are generated by the discrete element method and the meso-scale kinetic Monte Carlo method.
Titulo: Correlation between microstructures and macroscopic properties of nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) anodes: Meso-scale modeling and deep learning with convolutional neural networks

Sentencas: Then, the finite element method and the homogenization theory are used to calculate the effective elastic modulus (E), Poisson's ratio (& upsilon;), shear modulus (G) and coefficient of thermal expansion (CTE) of representative volume elements.
Titulo: Correlation between microstructures and macroscopic properties of nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) anodes: Meso-scale modeling and deep learning with convolutional neural networks

Sentencas: In addition, the triple-phase boundary length density (LTPB) is also calculated.
Titulo: Correlation between microstructures and macroscopic properties of nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) anodes: Meso-scale modeling and deep learning with convolutional neural networks

Sentencas: The convolutional neural network (CNN) based deep learning model is trained to find the potential relationship between the microstructures and the five effective macroscopic properties.
Titulo: Correlation between microstructures and macroscopic properties of nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) anodes: Meso-scale modeling and deep learning with convolutional neural networks

Sentencas: The comparison between the ground truth and the predicted values of the new samples proves that the CNN model has an excellent predictive performance.
Titulo: Correlation between microstructures and macroscopic properties of nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) anodes: Meso-scale modeling and deep learning with convolutional neural networks

Sentencas: This indicates that the CNN model could be used as an effective alternative to numerical simulations and homogenization because of its accurate and rapid prediction performance.
Titulo: Correlation between microstructures and macroscopic properties of nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) anodes: Meso-scale modeling and deep learning with convolutional neural networks

Sentencas: Hence the deep learning-based homogenization framework could potentially accelerate the continuum modeling of SOFCs for microstructure optimization.
Titulo: Correlation between microstructures and macroscopic properties of nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) anodes: Meso-scale modeling and deep learning with convolutional neural networks
